overview: Mr. Clark, the guidance counselor, receives Mandy in his office, who reveals to her that she wants to become a porn actress. Mr. Clark tries to dissuade Mandy from his decision, but fails to convince her to choose anything else. She is determined to do whatever it takes to make sure that Mr. Clark signs this document so as not to be reported to the principal.  Charlie who can not find a job since she is on probation, joins his old business partner Mia to plan a big blow. On the other hand, Tony, Charlie's probation officer intervenes. Charlie and Mia will have to use all means to distract him.
title: Her Best Interests
